label: specifiedOrganization
comment: The legally constituted organization specified for this trade party.
The project organization, such as a business or government body, for this requesting party.

rangeIncludes.comment: An organized structure set up for a particular purpose, such as a business, government body, department, charity, or financial institution.

domainIncludes.comment: An individual, a group, or a body having a role as a requestor.
An individual, a group, or a body having a role in a trade business function.
